name: Turn domains into appropriate links
description: Turns domains in a text into appropriate links to them. Respects, if the domains begin with "www". A simple "example.com" is not replaced because this pattern would often be a false positive.Try a text with "www.example.com", "http://example.com" and "http://www.example.com" and pay attention to the resulting href attribute.
author: Leif Matthiessen
